ygData.subject: Guild Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Fellow Holy Warriors I know that this does not really relate to paladin stuff but through the emails we have built a small community here and I have had
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Fellow Holy Warriors
I know that this does not really relate to "paladin stuff" but through
the emails we have
built a small community here and I have had many game questions answered
here so this
seemed like the best place to ask for help. I am currently a lvl 12 (1
bubble to 13th) High
Elf Paladin currently operating on the Cazic Thule server on the continent
of Faydwer and
I made a horrible mistake. I rushed into joining a guild not knowing what
type of people
the guild was and more wanting brotherhood then anything else. To my horror
I realized I
had joined a gang of petty kill stealing, cheat exploiting, bug exploiting
thugs. My problem
is that the guild officers refuse to allow me to leave the guild and was
hoping someone
could tell me a way that I can quit the guild without being removed.

Thank you all and may Tunare bless you all and may your blades find there
mark
Sol
